Account Officer Job at Brands and Trade Limited




        
    

        
        Brands and Trade Limited is a unique distribution and logistics company in Lagos poised to disrupt the distribution landscape. We have a team of thinkers and doers, some of whom are supply chain and distribution experts who share a singular commitment to the job done. This includes our investors and directors who are not active in day-to-day operations.

Brands and Trade has a track record of achievements, successes and capacity enhancement in retail distribution thereby opening opportunities for new partnerships and growth. We constantly invest in technology, building the right infrastructure, and deploying bespoke tools and applications for superior inventory management. This is in line with our commitment to delivering the highest standards of service to every customer.

Brands and Trade distributes many world-class brands and products across five categories: Wine and Spirits; Beverages (alcoholic and non-alcoholic); Hygiene, Home, and Personal Care; Oil, Cereals and Grains; and Animal and pet care. We are a benchmark distribution partner for many multi-billion-naira businesses in Nigeria including International Breweries (Ab-InBev), Monument Distillers, Grand Cereals and Oils Limited and 2Sure (Life Care Division of SevenUp Bottling Company Ltd).

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer

Job Location: Ajah / Abraham Adesanya - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: FMCG

Job Description


	We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Account Officer to join our team in a fast-paced FMCG modern trade environment.
	The ideal candidate must have solid accounting experience and be proficient in using QuickBooks (online) for daily financial operations.


Responsibilities


	Manage day-to-day accounting operations including receivables, payables, and reconciliations.
	Maintain accurate financial records and ensure compliance with company policies.
	Prepare and analyze financial reports for management review.
	Monitor sales, collections, and inventory transactions in line with FMCG operations.
	Support budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning processes.
	Liaise with external auditors, banks, and tax authorities when required.


Requirements


	B.Sc. / HND in Accounting, Finance, or related field.
	2 – 5 years of proven experience as an Account Officer, preferably in an FMCG/modern trade environment.
	Strong knowledge of QuickBooks Online and MS Excel.
	Good knowledge of financial regulations and standards.
	Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and organizational skills.
	High attention to detail and accuracy.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


Benefits


	Salary Offer: N100,000 - N150,000 monthly.
	Exposure to a dynamic FMCG modern trade business.
	Opportunities for career growth and professional development.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: herristoneresources@gmail.com using "Application – Account Officer" as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only candidate that resides in Ajah and it environs should send their CV.
